title: Release the Memes
author: VD
content_html:
You can submit your memes for next week’s Weekly Meme Review today – and today only – if you would like to have your favorite meme reviewed on the Darkstream. Send them to voxday AT gmail DOT com with WEEKLY MEME REVIEW in the subject. And please note that using a certain Hypergamouse frame will not score any extra points!

It is, however, remarkably useful across a broad line of subjects, as you can see.

DISCUSS ON SG
